```{r}
# prepare parameter combinations
library(noisewalker)
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)

# get data.table of parameter combinations
data <- CJ(nOctaves = seq(8), 
           frequency = seq(1, 8, 0.1), 
           increment = 0.01,#c(0.001, seq(10) / 10), 
           repl = seq(10))
```


```{r setup}
library(noisewalker)
noisewalker::run_noisewalker(1000, 100, 2, 2.0, 0.5, "1")
```
